abstract: Avid Life Media, corporate parent of web site Ashley Madison, announces that hackers have breached site and obtained personal information of millions of site's members; hackers demand that site be shut down or else information will be made public; site is online dating service for people who wish to cheat on their spouses.
lead_paragraph: Those who breached the site, which is marketed to those seeking extramarital affairs, threatened to release information about users.

headline.main: Ashley Madison, a Dating Website, Says Hackers May Have Data on Millions
headline.print_headline: Ashley Madison, a Website for Straying Spouses, Is Hit by an Online Attack

snippet: Those who breached the site, which is marketed to those seeking extramarital affairs, threatened to release information about users.
